The kingdom of the world has become the kingdom of our Lord and of his Christ, and he shall reign forever
nations raged, but your wrath came, and the time for the dead to be judged, and for rewarding your servants
And a great sign appeared in heaven: a woman clothed with the sun, with the moon under her feet,
into the wilderness, to the place where she is to be nourished for a time, and times, and half a time.
And I saw a beast rising out of the sea with ten horns and seven heads, with ten diadems on its horns
And the beast ... exercise authority for forty-two months. It opened its mouth to utter blasphemies
If anyone is to be taken captive, to captivity he goes; if anyone is to be slain with the sword,
and by the signs that it is allowed to work in the presence of the beast it deceives those who dwell
Then I looked, and behold, on Mount Zion stood the Lamb, and with him 144,000
and in their mouth no lie was found, for they are blameless.
Fallen, fallen is Babylon the great she who made all nations drink the wine of the passion
he also will drink the wine of God’s wrath poured full strength into the cup of his anger,
seated on the cloud one like a son of man with a golden crown on his head, and a sharp sickle
the grape harvest of the earth and threw it into the great winepress of the wrath of God.
standing beside the sea of glass with harps of God in their hands. And they sing the song of Moses
bowls full of the wrath of God who lives forever and ever, and the sanctuary was filled with smoke
painful sores came upon the people who bore the mark of the beast and worshiped its image.
For they have shed the blood of saints and prophets, and you have given them blood to drink.
the throne of the beast, and its kingdom was plunged into darkness. People gnawed their tongues
The sixth angel poured out his bowl on the great river Euphrates, and its water was dried up,
For they are demonic spirits performing signs, ...at the place that in Hebrew is called Armageddon.
And great hailstones, about one hundred pounds each, fell from heaven on people; and they cursed God
the judgment of the great prostitute who is seated ... on a scarlet beast that was full of blasphemous
The beast that you saw was, and is not, and is about to rise from the bottomless pit and go to destruction.
ten kings who ... are to receive authority as kings for one hour, together with the beast.
They will make war on the Lamb, and the Lamb will conquer them, for he is Lord of lords
Babylon ...has become a dwelling place for demons, a haunt for every unclean spirit
she glorified herself and lived in luxury, so give her a like measure of torment and mourning,
And the merchants of the earth weep and mourn for her, since no one buys their cargo anymore,
and cried out as they saw the smoke of her burning, What city was like the great city?
a great millstone and threw it into the sea, saying, So will Babylon the great city be thrown down
for his judgments are true and just; for he has judged the great prostitute who corrupted the earth
And from the throne came a voice saying, Praise our God, all you his servants, you who fear him,
clothe herself with fine linen, bright and pure— for the fine linen is the righteous deeds of the saints.
Then I saw heaven opened, and behold a white horse! The one sitting on it is called Faithful and True,
From his mouth comes a sharp sword with which to strike down the nations, and he will rule them
gather for the great supper of God, to eat the flesh of kings, the flesh of captains, the flesh of mighty
Then I saw thrones, and seated on them were those to whom the authority to judge was committed.
Then I saw a new heaven and a new earth, for the first heaven and the first earth had passed away
And he carried me away in the Spirit to a great, high mountain, and showed me the holy city Jerusalem
twelve gates..., and on the gates the names of the twelve tribes of the sons of Israel were inscribed—
And the one who spoke with me had a measuring rod of gold to measure the city and its gates and walls.
The foundations of the wall of the city were adorned with every kind of jewel. The first was jasper,
And the city has no need of sun or moon to shine on it, for the glory of God gives it light,
But nothing unclean will ever enter it, ..., but only those who are written in the Lamb’s book of life.
Then the angel showed me the river of the water of life, bright as crystal, flowing from the throne
And night will be no more. They will need no light of lamp or sun, for the Lord God will be their light,
And he said to me Do not seal up the words of the prophecy of this book, for the time is near.
Behold I am coming soon bringing my recompense with me to repay each one for what he has done.
I, Jesus, ...the bright morning star. ...let the one who is thirsty come; ... take the water of life
He who testifies to these things says, Surely I am coming soon. Amen. Come, Lord Jesus!
